roleset.name: scare
roleset.note: SPOOK-V NOTES: Frames file for 'spook' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet class spook 31.1, no mention of other members. No comparison. I think this is the first "psych verb" we've encountered. (from spook.01-v predicate notes)

role.descr: instrument, if arg0 is also present

example.name: passivized
example.text: They are still trying to lure back [small investors]-1 spooked *trace*-1 by the 1987 stock-market crash and the market's swings since then.
example.arg: by the 1987 stock-market crash and the market's swings since then

example.name: ARG2
example.text: It was not the first time that day I had failed to see the bonefish in the roiled water and spooked them with a blind cast that was off the mark.
example.arg: with a blind cast that was off the mark.

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: What really spooked the crowds along Wall Street , however , was the sudden concern that , whatever the reason , the pool of debt capital is drying up .
